trans-unit.source: Dynamic Server Access in a Reverse Proxy Configuration

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic Server Access in a Reverse Proxy Configuration

target.mrk: Accès dynamique au serveur dans une configuration de proxy inverse

trans-unit.source: Depending on both the corporate network infrastructure and the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server location, a mobile user agent might be forced to use different server access strings to access the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server.

seg-source.mrk: Depending on both the corporate network infrastructure and the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server location, a mobile user agent might be forced to use different server access strings to access the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server.

target.mrk: En fonction de l'infrastructure du réseau d'entreprise et de l'emplacement du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>, un utilisateur nomade peut être contraint d'utiliser différentes chaînes d'accès au serveur pour accéder au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>.

trans-unit.source: Based on the network’s gateway name, the Dynamic Server Access feature automatically detects which network the agent is connected to, and makes the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> able to connect using the correct server access string.

seg-source.mrk: Based on the network’s gateway name, the Dynamic Server Access feature automatically detects which network the agent is connected to, and makes the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> able to connect using the correct server access string.

target.mrk: Sur la base du nom de passerelle du réseau, l'accès dynamique au serveur détecte automatiquement le réseau auquel l'agent est connecté et permet à l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> de se connecter à l'aide de la chaîne d'accès au serveur appropriée.

trans-unit.source: This section explains how to create a dynamic server access file and how to use it to log into <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: This section explains how to create a dynamic server access file and how to use it to log into <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Cette section explique comment créer un fichier d'accès au serveur dynamique et comment l'utiliser pour se connecter à <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
